amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for Immigration and Customs Enforcement salaries and expenses by $10 million and to increase funding for the Federal Emergency Management Agency State and Local programs account by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for Immigration and Customs Enforcement salaries and expenses by $10 million and increase funding for the Federal Emergency Management Agency state and local programs by $10 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Clarke (MI) amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 159 - 254 (Roll no. 349).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Clarke (MI) amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 159 - 254 (Roll no. 349).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A014) offered by Mr. Clarke (MI).
